By using Melbourne Commuter, you agree to the following:
1. Data Sources: Live parking availability is sourced from the City of Melbourne open data. Availability may change and accuracy is not guaranteed.
2. Navigation: Directions are provided via third‑party apps (e.g., Google Maps). Always follow road rules and signage on site.
3. Location: If enabled, your device location is used only to show nearby parking and is not stored by this app.
4. Responsibility: You are responsible for safe driving and parking decisions. The app is provided “as is”, without warranties of any kind.
5. Privacy: We do not collect personal information. Logs and analytics (if enabled by you) may be used to improve the app experience.
6. Changes: Features and data sources may change without notice. Continued use constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
If you do not agree, please close the app.
